contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=September 2012}}{{Infobox Newspaper | name = Independent Record | image = [[File:Helena Independent Record logo.jpg|250px]] | caption = | type = Daily [[newspaper]] | format = [[Broadsheet]] | foundation = 1867<br>(as the ''Independent'') | ceased publication = | price = | owners = [[Lee Enterprises]] | publisher = Randy Rickman | editor = Holly Michels | language = | circulation = | headquarters = [[Helena, Montana|Helena]], [[Montana]], U.S. | ISSN = | website = [http://www.helenair.com/ HelenaIR.com] }} The '''''Independent Record''''' (often abbreviated to '''''IR''''') is a daily [[newspaper]] printed and distributed in [[Helena, Montana]]. It has a daily and Sunday circulation of approximately 14,000, according to the September 30, 2005, [[Audit Bureau of Circulations (North America)|Audit Bureau of Circulations]] Publisher Statement. The newspaper is part of the [[Lee Enterprises]] group, which owns 48 newspapers in 23 states.<ref>[http://www.lee.net/aboutlee/ "About Lee"]. [[Lee Enterprises]]. Retrieved November 12, 2011.</ref> == History == The roots of the ''IR'' lie in two newspapers founded in 1867, the [[weekly newspaper|weekly]] ''Independent'' of [[Deer Lodge, Montana|Deer Lodge]] and the daily ''Herald'' of Helena. The ''Independent'' soon moved to Helena and began daily publication in 1874. The ''Herald'' later merged with the ''Montana Daily Record'', which was founded in 1900. The new publication was renamed the ''Montana Herald-Record''. And in 1943, another merger followed: this time with the ''Independent'', to become the ''Independent Record''. After over thirty years of ownership by the [[Anaconda Copper Mining Company]], the ''IR'' was sold to Lee Enterprises in 1959. The ''IR'' converted from [[hot metal typesetting|hot metal]] to [[phototype]] in 1973, and in 1975 installed one of the first newsroom computer systems. In the summer of 2002, a new press plant was opened and housed in a new {{convert|30000|sqft|m2|adj=on}} printing and distribution center. ==Features== The ''IR'' is known for its Friday [[editorial]]: "Thumbs Up, Thumbs Down," in which it gives its stamp of either approval or disapproval on both local, national, or global events. ==Notable employees== * Publisher: Randy Rickman * Editor: Gerry O'Brien * Retail Ad Manager: Tonda Meyer * Classified Ad Manager: David Lyons * Circulation Director: Steve Biere * Controller: Lynn Lloyd * Production Manager: Lee King ==[[References]]== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.helenair.com/ ''Independent Record'' website] {{Newspapers in Montana}} {{Lee Enterprises}} [[Category:Newspapers published in Montana]] [[Category:Lee Enterprises publications]] [[Category:Helena, Montana]] [[Category:1867 establishments in Montana]] {{Montana-newspaper-stub}}
